StringTable.Label: GenericColonizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de módulos de colônia e edifícios básicos de colônia.

StringTable.Label: GenericColonizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Durante gerações a humanidade sonhou em colocar os pés em outros mundos. Esse sonho é agora uma realidade. Os pés estão sendo colocados em outros mundos. Estamos colocando muitas coisas em outros mundos de fato.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoIndustrializationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de edifícios de colônia melhorados.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoIndustrializationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Tudo é mais difícil na superfície de um mundo alienígena, cada máquina que possuímos tem que ser ajustada para as diferenças de gravidade ou atmosfera, todas as nossas velhas constantes e atalhos empíricos têm que ser jogadas fora e reescritas.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Não faz sentido parar na "competência básica" quando se trata de fazer coisas em ambientes alienígenas. Provavelmente deveríamos aprender com os muitos erros que ainda estamos cometendo, por exemplo, se apenas para melhorar nossa capacidade de fabricação.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossas fronteiras em rápida expansão disponibilizaram milhares e milhares de coisas novas para serem analisadas sob um microscópio. A expansão de nossas capacidades de pesquisa permitirá que nossos cientistas se mantenham atualizados.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz o custo de construção de centros de fabricação e pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Tendo descoberto o que funciona e não funciona em planetas alienígenas, fomos capazes de padronizar e modular um pouco nossas práticas de construção de edifícios, o que deve reduzir os custos de construção em toda a nossa civilização.

StringTable.Label: GenericAdvancedConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações de fabricação avançada.

StringTable.Label: GenericAdvancedConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Os avanços nas ciências dos materiais nos deram as ferramentas para construirmos maiores e mais arrojados, para finalmente alcançarmos algumas das imaginações mais selvagens que nossos arquitetos nos propuseram.

StringTable.Label: GenericConstructionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Sempre que aumentamos a escala de nossa fabricação, também aumentamos a escala de nossos erros. É preciso tempo e esforço para eliminar esses erros, mas isso precisa ser feito se quisermos atingir nosso verdadeiro potencial de fabricação.

StringTable.Label: GenericConstructionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Resistimos a deixar os contadores entrar nos centros de produção por muito tempo, porque o trabalho é perigoso e também porque ninguém gosta deles. Mas uma vez que eles encontraram uma maneira de entrar sorrateiramente, eles admitiram ter encontrado várias maneiras de reduzir os custos de fabricação.

StringTable.Label: GenericConstructionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz os custos de manutenção das plantas de manufatura.

StringTable.Label: GenericConstructionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: As fábricas e plantas de manufatura geram muitos subprodutos tóxicos que são caros de serem descartados. Ao tornar nossos processos de fabricação com menos desperdício, esperamos ver uma ampla economia de custos ao longo da vida útil de uma fábrica.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoManufacturingMethods_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações de fabricação exótica.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoManufacturingMethods_Dec
StringTable.String: Alguns de nossos processos de fabricação mais precisos resistiram à mudança para fora do mundo, lutando com a ampla gama de ambientes aos quais estão agora expostos. Pensamos tê-lo agora, mas ainda assim recomendamos que você invista em garantias estendidas.

StringTable.Label: GenericManufacturingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Melhora a capacidade de fabricação militar.

StringTable.Label: GenericManufacturingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: O uso de ferramentas em nossos centros de fabricação para nos especializarmos na produção militar envia uma mensagem muito pouco amigável a qualquer pessoa que nos preste muita atenção. No entanto, isso deve fazer os meninos e meninas em fadigas de camuflagem adaptativas felizes.

StringTable.Label: GenericManufacturingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Melhora a capacidade de fabricação civil.

StringTable.Label: GenericManufacturingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Um dos efeitos colaterais imprevistos da gestão de uma civilização nesta escala é encontrar coisas a ver com todas estas pessoas. Mantê-los felizes é tão importante quanto mantê-los seguros, e às vezes pode ser muito difícil para eles.

StringTable.Label: GenericManufacturingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Pensamos tirá-los de lá após a última vez, mas mais alguns contadores conseguiram entrar em nossos centros de fabricação. Ou eles estão vivendo agora nas paredes. Independentemente disso, eles encontraram mais algumas maneiras de reduzirmos nossas despesas gerais de fabricação.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialExpertise_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção das mais modernas instalações de fabricação.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialExpertise_Dec
StringTable.String: Manipulando materiais a nível atômico, podemos agora construir coisas de precisão inigualável. Isto ampliou maciçamente nossa capacidade industrial, juntamente com a criação de uma classe inteiramente nova de questões de segurança no local de trabalho bastante aterrorizantes.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Melhora a capacidade de fabricação militar.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Aos poucos, estamos descobrindo as últimas eficiências possíveis em nossos processos de fabricação militar, nossa civilização se transformando lentamente em uma máquina de guerra em si.

StringTable.Label: GenericIndustrialMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Poucos de nossos civis parecem se dar conta do desafio de construir as fazendas, hospitais e complexos de entretenimento dos quais eles dependem para sobreviver. E no entanto, toda vez que tentamos dizer-lhes o quanto estamos fazendo isso agora, eles apenas bocejam e vão embora.

StringTable.Label: GenericPracticalFusion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de centrais elétricas melhoradas.

StringTable.Label: GenericPracticalFusion_Dec
StringTable.String: Tornar os reatores de fusão em cascata robustos, à prova de adulterações e, em geral, à prova de catástrofes, exigiu muito trabalho. Mas agora que o fizemos, esperamos ver melhor capacidade de fabricação e apenas o mínimo de catástrofes.

StringTable.Label: GenericQuantumPower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de usinas de energia exóticas.

StringTable.Label: GenericQuantumPower_Dec
StringTable.String: Ao aproveitar a energia quântica de ponto zero de um vácuo, nossos físicos afirmam que agora temos acesso a uma enorme fonte de energia. Não é infinito, mas o rapaz sempre existe muito dele.

StringTable.Label: GenericManufacturingStimulus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumentam substancialmente os níveis de fabricação de nossa civilização por 15 turnos. (Capstone)

StringTable.Label: GenericManufacturingStimulus_Dec
StringTable.String: Ao concentrar todas as nossas instalações de pesquisa no aumento da fabricação, seremos capazes de aumentar consideravelmente nossas capacidades de fabricação, pelo menos até que os pesquisadores comecem a reclamar de não terem permissão para fazer seus experimentos mais exóticos.

StringTable.Label: GenericInstitutionalResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa melhoradas.

StringTable.Label: GenericInstitutionalResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: Estamos no nosso melhor quando não estamos apenas vivendo neste universo, mas observando-o. Descobrindo-o. Às vezes desmantelando pequenas partes dele. Ao criar lugares especiais para que isso aconteça, esperamos que os avanços da pesquisa ocorram com muito mais freqüência.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Melhoramos e tornamos mais eficientes muitas de nossas práticas de pesquisa, o que deve levar a pesquisas mais rápidas ou, no mínimo, menos pesquisadores reclamando da burocracia.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz o custo de fabricação de melhorias na pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Com a pressa de começar a processar e analisar todos os novos dados que nossa rápida expansão proporcionou, uma série de práticas de pesquisa horrivelmente esbanjadoras tornou-se comum. Eliminando essas práticas, devemos ser capazes de tornar nossa pesquisa um pouco mais barata.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz os custos de manutenção de melhorias na pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Os laboratórios de pesquisa estão cheios de brinquedos caros que estão em um estado quase constante de avaria. Ao considerarmos como fazer parte disto de forma mais sustentável, esperamos ver uma ampla economia de custos ao longo da vida útil de um laboratório.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchCenters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa avançada.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchCenters_Dec
StringTable.String: Ao colocar todas as nossas pessoas mais inteligentes e seus brinquedos favoritos no mesmo prédio, esperamos ver melhorias significativas em nossa capacidade de pesquisar novos campos. Além disso, lhes daremos comida para que não tenham motivos para sair.

StringTable.Label: GenericTechnologicalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Ao concentrar nossos esforços em pesquisa pura, conseguimos obter uma melhoria significativa na taxa de novas descobertas.

StringTable.Label: GenericTechnologicalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz o custo de melhorias na pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericTechnologicalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ao concentrar nossos esforços em nossa infra-estrutura de pesquisa, conseguimos reduzir o custo de construção de novas instalações.

StringTable.Label: GenericTechnologicalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz a manutenção de melhorias na pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericTechnologicalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Ao focar como nossos pesquisadores trabalham e eliminar alguns dos experimentos mais esbanjadores, conseguimos reduzir significativamente a manutenção de nossas instalações de pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericIntegratedResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa exóticas.

StringTable.Label: GenericIntegratedResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: Fizemos grandes avanços em nossa compreensão do universo e agora precisamos de academias maiores para facilitar os estudos multidisciplinares necessários para empurrar o véu mais para trás. Os pesquisadores também estão exigindo algo chamado de "bar de faculdades".

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção das mais modernas instalações de pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Imagine milhões de cientistas, trabalhando em uma instalação de pesquisa do tamanho de uma cidade, sem nenhuma das distrações do mundo exterior, como o clima ou o contato social básico. Sim, alguns se transformarão em psicopatas. Mas estávamos planejando ficar de olho neles de qualquer maneira.

StringTable.Label: GenericDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa profunda.

StringTable.Label: GenericDeeperKnowledge_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossa compreensão do universo tem crescido a passos largos. Equipes que fizeram um esforço para desacelerar e considerar algumas das implicações dessas descobertas estão agora revelando padrões mais profundos no tecido da realidade.

StringTable.Label: GenericQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa profunda melhoradas.

StringTable.Label: GenericQuantumUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossas últimas instalações não estão mais tateando às cegas no limite do mundo subatômico. Para começar, há vinte arestas, e são menos arestas que toroides, e agora, na verdade, há zero delas. Acontece que a realidade é super complicada.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações avançadas de pesquisa profunda. Prepara a civilização para a Ascensão.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeyondMortality_Dec
StringTable.String: A ascensão nos tornará imortais, e nos conduzirá a uma realidade que está além desta. O que lá está permanece um mistério, mas nunca nos afastamos deles antes.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchCoordination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações de apoio à pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericResearchCoordination_Dec
StringTable.String: A pesquisa coordenada só tem se tornado mais desafiadora à medida que nossa civilização tem crescido. Os Centros de Coordenação de Pesquisa devem ajudar a amenizar esse desafio, minimizando qualquer duplicação de esforços, e melhorar a produtividade das instalações de pesquisa vizinhas.

StringTable.Label: GenericNeroLinking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: GenericNeroLinking_Dec
StringTable.String: Os benefícios da comunicação direta cérebro a cérebro serão sentidos em uma grande variedade de campos, mas considerando o quão incômodos socialmente muitos de nossos pesquisadores são, suspeitamos que eles serão os que mais lucrarão em viver em um mundo sem conversa fiada.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de edifícios civis. Aumenta o crescimento populacional.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlanetaryImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Metade da diversão de mudar-se para um novo lugar é consertá-lo de acordo com suas necessidades. Isso é mais difícil quando o novo lugar é todo um planeta alienígena, mas finalmente estamos desenvolvendo as ferramentas e técnicas para fazer exatamente isso.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlanetarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossa tecnologia agrícola melhorou drasticamente e, como resultado, estamos começando a ver um aumento no rendimento das colheitas. As cenouras ainda têm aquele gosto estranho, mas estamos trabalhando para isso.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlanetarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Agora que somos capazes de modular os efeitos que um mundo estranho tem sobre a fertilidade, nossas taxas de crescimento populacional estão começando a subir. Mais bebês por enquanto, mas mais trabalhadores em breve.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlanetarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Não estamos mais apenas sobrevivendo em novos mundos, mas prosperando lá. Graças ao melhor rendimento em nutrientes e técnicas de preservação, nossos trabalhadores podem trabalhar mais e mais, melhorando a capacidade de produção de toda a nossa civilização.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de fazendas melhoradas. Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Dec
StringTable.String: Adaptar nossa experiência agrícola para se adaptar a uma variedade de ambientes estranhos provou ser um desafio, e levou muitos avanços simultâneos em nosso entendimento do solo, da ciência atmosférica e das pás. É isso mesmo. Em alguns planetas, precisamos de pás especiais.

StringTable.Label: GenericAgriculturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our planting, feeding, and harvesting regimens to account for differences in the seasons of alien worlds takes a lot of effort and has to be fine tuned on every planet. But now that we're able to do it, we expect to see greater food yields.

StringTable.Label: GenericAgriculturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Agora que temos mais experiência no cultivo de alimentos em mundos alienígenas, nossos engenheiros agrícolas são capazes de prever com antecedência o equipamento agrícola que uma colônia precisará antes de ser formada, levando a custos mais baixos para o início das operações.

StringTable.Label: GenericAgriculturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz o custo de manutenção das fazendas.

StringTable.Label: GenericAgriculturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Dando um passo atrás na vanguarda da ciência agrícola, e utilizando equipamentos mais antigos e mais confiáveis, podemos reduzir os custos de funcionamento da maioria de nossas fazendas..

StringTable.Label: GenericIntensiveFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de fazendas avançadas.

StringTable.Label: GenericIntensiveFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: A maximização da produção alimentar de um determinado terreno de solo é um passo caro, mas muito necessário para aqueles mundos onde a terra arável vem com um prêmio.

StringTable.Label: GenericFarmingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Os micróbios presentes em solo alienígena reagem de forma diferente aos nutrientes do que estamos acostumados, e é preciso algum tempo para afinar nossas técnicas de fertilização para manter nossas próprias plantas alimentadas. Mas agora que o fizemos, esperamos ver uma produção alimentar ainda maior.

StringTable.Label: GenericFarmingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Por fim, nos debruçamos sobre as espécies e cepas de plantas que se adaptam à mais ampla gama de ambientes. Ao concentrar nossos esforços de produção nessas culturas, os custos de arranque de qualquer fazenda devem agora ser muito mais gerenciáveis.

StringTable.Label: GenericFarmingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz os custos de manutenção das fazendas.

StringTable.Label: GenericFarmingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Os agricultores de toda a nossa civilização estão enfrentando desafios agrícolas únicos todos os dias. Ao implementar sistemas de compartilhamento de informações em toda a civilização, podemos difundir ainda mais nossas melhores práticas, reduzindo os custos operacionais agrícolas em todos os lugares.

StringTable.Label: GenericLosslessFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de fazendas exóticas.

StringTable.Label: GenericLosslessFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: As melhorias em nossos sistemas de reciclagem e distribuição de nutrientes levaram a fazendas quase perfeitamente eficientes. Nossos fazendeiros não precisam nem sujar as mãos agora e estão ficando um pouco preocupados com isso.

StringTable.Label: GenericAgriculturalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossa capacidade de produção de alimentos deu mais um passo à frente. Além disso, finalmente tiramos aquele gosto estranho das cenouras, mas acontece que agora todos gostam, então tivemos que colocá-lo de volta.

StringTable.Label: GenericAgriculturalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: As fazendas aumentam o crescimento populacional.

StringTable.Label: GenericAgriculturalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Temos uma quantidade tão excessiva de alimentos agora que muitos de nosso povo tomaram quase como um desafio criar famílias capazes de consumir tudo isso.

StringTable.Label: GenericFoodDistributionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de edifícios de apoio à agricultura. Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

StringTable.Label: GenericFoodDistributionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Parece entediante, e na verdade também é entediante, mas graças aos avanços na xeno-contabilidade e a melhoria resultante na logística de nosso sistema de distribuição de alimentos, estamos agora economizando muitos alimentos que antes tinham sido desperdiçados.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoIrrigation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de edifícios melhorados de apoio à agricultura. Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoIrrigation_Dec
StringTable.String: Há uma série de desafios surpreendentes ao irrigar um planeta alienígena, devido à incrível variedade de condições gravitacionais, do solo e da atmosfera que encontramos. Além disso, a água está, em muitos casos, escondida.

StringTable.Label: GenericBiomassResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de edifícios avançados de apoio à agricultura. Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

StringTable.Label: GenericBiomassResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: Fundamentalmente, os alimentos são pouco mais que longas cadeias de carbono dispostas em moléculas que achamos digeríveis e saborosas. Plantas e animais têm feito um bom trabalho de sequenciamento dessas cadeias até hoje, mas não está na hora de deixarmos um robô abrir uma fenda?

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoBiology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações médicas melhoradas. Aumenta o crescimento populacional.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoBiology_Dec
StringTable.String: Compreender como os seres humanos se adaptam ao ambiente microbiológico de mundos alienígenas será fundamental para nossas chances de sobrevivência quando colonizarmos as estrelas. Perder uma colônia para uma diarréia catastrófica simplesmente não é uma opção.

StringTable.Label: GenericPopulationEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: GenericPopulationEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: É preciso muito romance, mas para que nossas colônias tenham sucesso, elas precisam de bebês, e precisam deles rapidamente. Dedicar mais recursos para melhorar a fertilidade e a música de humor deve ajudar.

StringTable.Label: GenericBioReplication_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de instalações médicas exóticas. Aumenta o crescimento populacional.

StringTable.Label: GenericBioReplication_Dec
StringTable.String: Uma vez que tiramos todas as partes divertidas da reprodução, fomos capazes de aumentar drasticamente nossas taxas de crescimento. Claro, a bio-replicação pode estar nos levando a um mundo de pesadelo de conformismo e menos vagas de estacionamento disponíveis. Mas vamos conseguir de alguma forma.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a melhoria do solo e melhora os efeitos do terreno adjacente.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnvironmentalEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossa capacidade de melhorar e melhorar o ambiente em que trabalhamos trará benefícios a quase todos os aspectos da colonização e tornará os passeios ao ar livre um pouco menos mortais.

StringTable.Label: GenericExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a instalação em mundos extremos, com potencial de produção reduzido.

StringTable.Label: GenericExtremeWorldColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: Não estamos mais limitados aos frutos de baixo peso do estoque de planetas da galáxia. Não será uma vida fácil para ninguém que vive nestes novos mundos, mas será uma vida.

StringTable.Label: GenericColonizationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Aquatic Worlds, and boost their wealth and Tourism.

StringTable.Label: GenericColonizationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossa experiência lidando com os desafios da vida no mundo aquático nos permitiu tornar a vida lá quase tão confortável quanto em qualquer outro lugar de nossa civilização. Os bonés de banho não são mais obrigatórios.

StringTable.Label: GenericColonizationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Congelados, e aumenta sua Pesquisa e Influência.

StringTable.Label: GenericColonizationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Agora somos tão bons em viver em mundos de bola de neve que muitos colonos passam dias sem usar luvas, algo que teria sido considerado imprudente mesmo há alguns anos atrás.

StringTable.Label: GenericColonizationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Áridos, e impulsiona sua Produção e Militares.

StringTable.Label: GenericColonizationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Foi necessária alguma tecnologia de reciclagem de água cara e maciçamente invasiva para fazê-lo, mas a vida em mundos áridos é agora mais ou menos tão produtiva quanto em qualquer outro lugar. Os cateteres agora também são muito mais confortáveis.

StringTable.Label: GenericAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a instalação em mundos radioativos e tóxicos, com potencial de produção reduzido.

StringTable.Label: GenericAtmosphericCleansing_Dec
StringTable.String: Mesmo os ambientes planetários mais sujos e tóxicos podem agora ser colonizados por nós. Boa sorte para os pobres bastardos que vão em busca disso, mas ao menos agora terão uma chance de lutar.

StringTable.Label: GenericBiospherePerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Radioativos, e aumenta sua produção de Produção.

StringTable.Label: GenericBiospherePerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: As mutações e defeitos genéticos que eram um fato da vida dos primeiros colonizadores de mundos radioativos são agora coisa do passado. Quaisquer outras mutações serão deixadas em vigor apenas para fins cosméticos.

StringTable.Label: GenericBiospherePerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Tóxicos, e aumenta sua produção de Pesquisa.

StringTable.Label: GenericBiospherePerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: Temos dominado os desafios de viver até mesmo nos planetas mais venenosos. Você ainda não vai querer ir para fora sem seu capacete, mas nós mudamos a maioria dos lugares que valem a pena ir para dentro de qualquer maneira.

StringTable.Label: GenericTerraformingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de plantas de terraformação.

StringTable.Label: GenericTerraformingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A terraformação é um negócio complicado, delicadamente posicionado entre tornar um mundo mais habitável para nós sem destruir toda a sua biosfera para fazê-lo. E não há nada para fazer.

StringTable.Label: GenericHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: GenericHabitatImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossa capacidade de manipular a biosfera melhorou ao ponto de podermos tratar continentes inteiros com uma tela. Vamos pintar um retrato de uma civilização pujante e próspera? Ou o equivalente a escrever nossos nomes na neve com urina?

StringTable.Label: GenericSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite o uso de terrenos quase inúteis.

StringTable.Label: GenericSoilReclamation_Dec
StringTable.String: Muitos planetas fazem um trabalho muito pobre de tornar o terreno utilizável para fins coloniais. Onde a natureza deixou cair a bola, nós entramos, e agora somos capazes de desenvolver o que antes eram locais muito marginais.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumenta a quantidade de terra utilizável em todos os planetas colonizados.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnvironmentalResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: Agora estamos jogando com forças poderosas, capazes de manipular o terreno planetário em uma escala nunca vista antes. Devemos ter certeza de usar este poder com sabedoria, ou pelo menos não ativamente para o mal.

StringTable.Label: GenericEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: GenericEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations, we've looked up at the stars and wondered, "What if?" Well buckle up, because "if" has happened. By bending space around our ships we can use conventional propulsion in a pocket of normal space while accelerating at incredible speeds.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensor, life support, and speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: Even at the incredible speeds we can travel at now, if we want to journey anywhere beyond the closest stars we'll need to make significant improvements to our navigational and life support systems. More refined hyperdrives wouldn't hurt either.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After analyzing how our first generation of hyperdrives have (and haven't) worked, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our ships' speeds.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of Colony & Constuctor modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pushing large Support Modules through space is inherently wasteful, by miniaturizing and optimizing the larger components, we can fit more on a ship, allowing them to go farther and faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of all ships.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: After listening to the complaints and coughs of our returning crews, we've improved the life support recirculation systems of our ships, which should marginally increase their effective range.

StringTable.Label: GenericIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: GenericIonDriveTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By using magnetic fields to capture ions from the interstellar medium during hyperdrive flight, we can funnel this additional mass into the exhaust of our engines, increasing our overall speed. Called Ion Drives, they make us go faster, basically.

StringTable.Label: GenericIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: GenericIonOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ion capture technology of our Ion Drives requires a fiendish amount of tuning that our ship's engineers are only just learning to automate. Once this work is done, we should see slightly higher speeds across our fleet.

StringTable.Label: GenericIonOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Hyperfield generators are no longer the rare pieces of equipment they once were, and we're beginning to see efficiencies of scale that have reduced the unit-cost for each one.

StringTable.Label: GenericIonOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Every year our hyperdrives get more efficient and smaller. Less room for the engines means more room for everything else, benefiting every type of ship we could conceive of.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarpFieldTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are now able to "stack" up the space-bending fields of our hyperdrives, magnifying their acceleration effect. They call these stacked arrangements "Warp Fields" and are now using them to create vastly more powerful engines.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarpFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By tuning the arrangement of stacked hyperfields in a variety of dimensions, we've found some surprisingly cheap ways to improve the speed of our Warp Drives.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarpFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're using stacked fields and multi-field generators, even the most minuscule improvement in cost-efficiency can lead to significant savings.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarpFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience working with the effects of stacked hyperfields, we've determined that we were stacking them inefficiently. Smaller field generators can achieve the same effects as their fatter predecessors.

StringTable.Label: GenericHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: GenericHyperwarpWaves_Dec
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Waves consist of warp fields cascading in front of the vessel, allowing a warp drive to effectively compress already compressed space. That glosses over a number of complicated mathematical issues, but the end result is even faster drives.

StringTable.Label: GenericHyperwarpMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: No other civilization in the galaxy can match ours for the ease and efficiency with which we build our drives. And still human ingenuity can find ways to make them cheaper.

StringTable.Label: GenericHyperwarpMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered hyperfield technology, and are now capable of wringing the most possible speed from even the smallest engines.

StringTable.Label: GenericStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: GenericStellarFoldingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar folding bends space on a scale never seen before, hyperfields approaching the diameter of a star. Our ships are now the fastest in the galaxy, and perhaps the fastest the galaxy has ever seen.

StringTable.Label: GenericHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericHyperfieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Careful analysis of the way hyperfield waves interact when ships are travelling in formation has revealed the possibility of building larger field generators capable of increasing the drive efficiency of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: GenericGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericGravityFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: It took a long time to finally find the graviton. It turned out to be inside us the whole time. But now we can use it to generate massive artificial gravity fields, which should improve the maneuverability and tactical options of our ships in combat.

StringTable.Label: GenericHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of enemy speed reduction modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericHyperfieldDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: By analyzing the interference effects of multiple hyperwave fields from different ships travelling in close proximity, we can now limit the speed of enemy ships within the range of a properly equipped starbase.

StringTable.Label: GenericStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericStellarFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: The Stellar Field Projector allows properly equipped ships to effectively "tow" ships with less capable drives. The same technology will help us improve the hyperfield enhancing capabilities of our support modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericDriveOptimization._ShortDec
StringTable.String: Substantially boost the speed of all ships for 15 Turns. (Capstone)

StringTable.Label: GenericDriveOptimization._Dec
StringTable.String: With a little persuasion we have been able to convince many of our researchers leave there cozy research centers and do some practical studies, onboard our ships. The result has been an impressive increase of our average ship speeds. Unfortunate the researchers will need to return to there offices before to long, unless we continue to fund this endeavor.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved sensors and survey modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: "Look before you leap," is excellent advice in all sorts of aspects of life and galactic civilization building. Now we finally have the sensor and survey tools for our ships to do just that.

StringTable.Label: GenericSensorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of nano-processors allow us to more rapidly process the massive volumes of information our sensors return, improving the overall effectiveness of our sensor systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericSensorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The hyperfield detectors which our sensors use were originally cobbled together from left over drives. Now that we have dedicated sensor manufacturing equipment, we can expect to see some significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: GenericSensorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest sensors were crude, jury-rigged things, and if we begin swapping out their parts for dedicated sensor-specific equipment, we should see significant weight savings.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnergyFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Improvements in our understanding of the effects of space folding have revealed that hyperdrives are detectable at much greater distances than previously believed.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnergyFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our technicians have found that by turning one of the knobs up, our sensor systems can see a bit further. We feel kind of dumb for not realizing this before.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnergyFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our sensor systems had several redundant parts, which when stripped out has led to the production of cheaper, more efficient systems. The accountants are all very excited.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnergyFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The creation of high-density field detection components should lead to more compact sensors, leaving our ship designers more room to install guns. Everyone wins. Except the people the guns are pointed at.

StringTable.Label: GenericSubspaceSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Subspace is the 12-dimension space that lies at right angles to and a little bit behind our universe, and it took us a very long time to figure out how to look at it. The upshot is that we can now build a new generation of very powerful sensors.

StringTable.Label: GenericSensorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: When a ragtag group of science-accountants teamed up with the goal of identifying cost savings in our most advanced sensor systems, few believed they had a chance. Many openly mocked them. Some people spit on them. But somehow they managed it.

StringTable.Label: GenericSensorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of our newest sensor systems has revealed that several of their components don't technically have to exist in this universe. By shifting their workload into another plane, we can reduce the amount of mass we have to lug around in ours.

StringTable.Label: GenericTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericTargetingAssistTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A study of how our ships have performed in combat has led to a number of improvements in our tactical targeting systems. At the same time, we've devised a system which should confuse enemy sensors.

StringTable.Label: GenericTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and evasion modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericTargetingSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted our tactical sensor improvements into support modules, capable of allowing a single ship to provide sensor accuracy and evasive benefits to an entire fleet of vessels.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research, and begins the path towards Ascension.

StringTable.Label: GenericXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: For some time we've known of a race, or races, of long dead aliens called the Precursors. It's taken some time to adapt our survey systems to identify their relics, but now that we have, we hope to learn a few of their secrets.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've had an opportunity to study a few precursor relics, we've been able to detect patterns in them which have allowed us to build a framework which should greatly aid future Precursor research efforts.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorRelicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding Precursor artifacts involves throwing out many of our pre-conceived notions about technology. Their interfaces don't just assume we have different anatomy; they assume we have different ways of thinking entirely.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorRelicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The public seems fascinated by the Precursors, and the relics we've found have had a surprising effect on our society. We can now try to capitalize on these cultural benefits. Souvenirs. Wacky catchphrases. Things like that.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorRelicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of the Precursor relics we find are a mystery to us, doing little more than generating patterns of pretty lights. Though it turns out there is a massive consumer market for pretty lights which we might want to capitalize on.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment. The construction of dedicated facilities staffed with Precursor specialists will allow us to make the most of these incredible artifacts.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to try recreating some of the Precursor's technology. Extremely advanced fabrication equipment will be needed to continue this work, but the benefits to our other research programs could be immeasurable.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: GenericPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor relics reveal their secrets to us with ease now, and we're close to building our own relics ourselves. We have almost as full an understanding of Precursor technology as the Precursors did themselves.

StringTable.Label: GenericLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved life support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems surprising that the factor limiting the travel range for our ships is its life support system, but there you have it. For anything less than a colony ship, keeping the occupants alive is now a bigger challenge than keeping the engines fueled.

StringTable.Label: GenericLifeSupportOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience with the rigors of space travel, and the shrieked radio transmissions of the few who fell to the rigors of space travel, have revealed a number of small improvements we might be able to make to our existing life support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericLifeSupportOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Reducing the cost of building life support systems is one of those things we often have to do that we don't want to advertise too much. It's hard enough finding naval recruits as it is.

StringTable.Label: GenericLifeSupportOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By minimizing the amount of weight and space our life support systems take up, we leave more room for our life reduction systems, which is what we're now calling guns.

StringTable.Label: GenericSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced life support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericSupportFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Our growing familiarity with force fields has enabled us to replace our mechanical life support systems with more elegant field based processors. Food is now stored in a single block of nutrient-rich sludge, piped directly into the user's mouth.

StringTable.Label: GenericSupportFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By aerating the nutrient sludge we provide our crews it takes up significantly more volume in their stomachs, making them feel full with less food. There are some associated problems with, uh, gas, but we're coming up with special filters to address that.

StringTable.Label: GenericSupportFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now really, really cheap. Still effective though, let's not forget that. Maybe let's not even call them cheap. "Economical," or "Value," maybe.

StringTable.Label: GenericSupportFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of efficient field generators, and also putting our crews on a diet, we've been able to reduce the mass of our life support systems even more.

StringTable.Label: GenericPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic life support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The Promethion Support System extends our field life support further, with all the requirements for a living organism - oxygen, water, and food - now piped directly into that organism rather than left to float around and get on the equipment.

StringTable.Label: GenericLifeSupportMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the crews are finding out how little we're spending on their life support systems. "Do you think we're worthless?" they shout. And we don't, we really don't. They're not worthless at all! Worth less, yes. But that's different.

StringTable.Label: GenericLifeSupportMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our nutrient sludge now delivers itself to the crew using embedded Promethion field effectors, saving us the weight of carrying around heavy fixed effectors. The embedded effectors come out in the waste stream, ready for reuse. After cleaning, of course.

StringTable.Label: GenericLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate life support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now close to perfect, wasting no resources whatsoever and recycling essentially all waste products. As an added bonus, the fields have been reduced in size and are now much less humiliating for the crew.

StringTable.Label: GenericSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericSupportFieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our switch to field based life support systems has made it possible to offload some materials to other vessels. Additionally, it should now be possible to supplement fleets via unmanned supply probes launched from an appropriately equipped facility.

StringTable.Label: GenericExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericExplorationExtention_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted the latest in Promethion support field technology to be used by our fleet-support vessels, thus increasing an entire fleet's travel range. Additionally, we've made significant improvements to our starbase life support extension modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings, and small hulls.

StringTable.Label: GenericOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our ship construction operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures. We're not quite there yet, but the first step out of the well was always going to be the biggest.

StringTable.Label: GenericOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: You can't put just anyone in a space suit and get them to build things in orbit. It turns out that most people don't understand what an orbit is. Some improved training programs should dramatically improve our orbital manufacturing capability.

StringTable.Label: GenericOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Getting material to the right orbit at the right time is something we're only just coming to grips with. It turns out that orbital plane change maneuvers are really expensive. But once we scale this up, our logistical ability should greatly improve.

StringTable.Label: GenericOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ironically enough, space is at a premium in space, inside of our hulls at least. Even small improvements in packing efficiencies are worth the effort of hunting them down.

StringTable.Label: GenericZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of our initial attempts at micro-gravity construction used clumsy variations of ground-based techniques, not far removed from banging rocks together. Now that we have a little more experience, we should be able to build on a much larger scale.

StringTable.Label: GenericZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After donating a few hulls for weapons practice, we were able to see the structural damage inflicted on them, and identify structural reinforcements that should toughen each ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: GenericZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Worksite planning in an orbital environment is a seriously complicated business, but now that we've got the hang of it, we should see significant cost savings for every hull we construct.

StringTable.Label: GenericZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to build hollow structural elements still capable of handling very high compression loads. By maximizing the use of these and routing various ancillary ship systems through the cavities, we can save space for mission critical equipment.

StringTable.Label: GenericLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Building larger hulls is more involved than just adding more stuff to them. Ensuring that they won't collapse under acceleration is a serious challenge. Seating, to ensure our crews doesn't collapse under acceleration is another surprising challenge.

StringTable.Label: GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems counter-intuitive, but by introducing very small weaknesses in the molecular structure of our hulls, we can make them deformable in controlled ways, making our hulls quite a bit more resilient.

StringTable.Label: GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of self-propelled manufacturing equipment will allow our workers to maneuver inside of hulls with much greater ease, reducing the challenge and expense of construction.

StringTable.Label: GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: As our hulls grew ever larger, we began to lose some of the art of packing that our predecessors had. But now thanks to the scale of our ships, even very small improvements in packing can lead to more room for everything else.

StringTable.Label: GenericMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We're building massive ships capable of blotting out the stars. Obviously any ship can blot out the stars if you get close enough to it. You just don't have to get very close to these ones for that to be the case. Nor would you want to.

StringTable.Label: GenericHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: That we build the best ships in the galaxy is undeniable, but that we do it so economically is what's really impressive. Our enemies have never been menaced so thriftily.

StringTable.Label: GenericHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to advances in the field of bristling, never before have our ships been so bristling with weapons. They could also bristle with other things we suppose.

StringTable.Label: GenericHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: Using new force field technologies, we've been able to embed strengthening fields within the structures of our vessels, making them substantially more resistant to damage. They also now tingle if you lick them.

StringTable.Label: GenericHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can now be used to conduct partial repairs as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: GenericSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny little self-replicating nanobots are capable of almost anything as long as we don't ask too many questions about them. Nanobot repair modules in our ships and starbases will be able to repair damage during battle itself.

StringTable.Label: GenericCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat will allow us to project force while keeping our capital ships out of danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently there's something glamorous about dying in a very small ship.

StringTable.Label: GenericCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: GenericCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: GenericCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: GenericCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These tuff little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end, and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our latest generation of fighters, designed to be more compact and packable, and the improved repair, reloading, and recovery facilities that go with them, we're now able to deploy high-capacity carriers.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to build a ship, it's another thing to keep it running. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.

StringTable.Label: GenericLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've figured out some of the issues relativistic travel creates with our timekeeping and administration, we've been able to significantly improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: GenericLogisticalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: An asteroid mining operation is a ballet of activity, as boring machines, ore haulers, and repair drones swarm about an asteroid. Keeping these pieces moving is challenging, and improving the organization is a sure way to improve its output.

StringTable.Label: GenericLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs humanity has ever created. Any improvement we can make to the management and operation of these beasts will result in significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: GenericFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.

StringTable.Label: GenericDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.

StringTable.Label: GenericGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well. The part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics.

StringTable.Label: GenericInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't have ships without the resources to build them. The same can be said for lots of things actually. Improved mining technologies will benefit every aspect of our civilization. At least the aspects of our civilization which require building things.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mining operations are capable of generating more resources while losing less miners than ever before. The miners rejoice! Well. Not rejoice, exactly. They seem less grumpy than usual. Still, that's something.

StringTable.Label: GenericResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: GenericResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Valuable resources can be found in most asteroids in extremely low concentrations. Extracting these hasn't been practical until the development of probes capable of independently navigating the subsurface to collect the goodies within.

StringTable.Label: GenericLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: GenericLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Miniaturizing our resource extraction probes to the nano-scale has allowed for almost perfectly lossless resource extraction. Additionally, the rarest of rare resources can now feasibly be targeted for extraction.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't be naive about who or what we might find in the galaxy. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against a yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.

StringTable.Label: GenericWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.

StringTable.Label: GenericWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: GenericWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether light, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of it all at one place.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of the ultra transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage output of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're a bit more so.

StringTable.Label: GenericMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been able to weaponize a collimated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in crystallography have created a new generation of focusing crystals capable of handling much greater quantities of energy without fracturing. All of our beam weapons just got a little bit badder.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Manufacturing beam weapons is as much art as science, requiring highly trained technicians to individually tune each weapon. But if we can standardize this a bit, and even automate portions of it, we should be able to reduce the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The heaviest parts of beam weapons have always been the charge coils and their associated cooling equipment. But with the latest generation of super-conductors we can now build these smaller and more compact than ever.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to generate collimated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our supply chain for the creation of plasma containment fields had a couple of kinks that needed to get worked out, but now that we have, we expect to be able to create beam weapons for far cheaper.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the energy density limits that physics allow. If we want any more power per unit of mass, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. In short, these particles can induce a chain reaction that breaks an enemy down into neutrinos, effectively evaporating it.

StringTable.Label: GenericDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe. So that's good news.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found that the capacity of our beam energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which allows for increased beam output. Such fields could be projected at a distance, improving the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: After considerable study in the way that beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam outputs. Additionally, we can now build beams that can cripple enemy shields.

StringTable.Label: GenericMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.

StringTable.Label: GenericMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.

StringTable.Label: GenericMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.

StringTable.Label: GenericMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: GenericHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking, and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: More target drones have given their lives for our glory, and a careful analysis of their deaths has revealed some exciting possibilities in the field of shaped charges, which should improve the destructive yield of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The most delicate part of missile manufacturing was the warhead, for obvious reasons. But the latest generation of ultra-stable explosives should reduce both manufacturing costs and workplace accidents significantly.

StringTable.Label: GenericWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of shaped-charge warheads to reduce the weight of each individual missile, with no corresponding loss of destructive power, we can make room for more missile launchers in total.

StringTable.Label: GenericPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: By embedding a device in our warheads which releases a high energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing the destructive potential of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: GenericPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile manufacturing facilities are now almost perfectly efficient, wasting no material whatsoever. Destruction shouldn't come so cheap, yet here we are.

StringTable.Label: GenericPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new field based guidance system which uses forcefields to provide final maneuvering capabilities should cut down on the weight of our missiles systems a bit more.

StringTable.Label: GenericPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor piercing technology with our latest anti-matter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.

StringTable.Label: GenericNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare Torpedoes at.

StringTable.Label: GenericMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship and starbase modules which can improve the tracking and ultimately the range of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: GenericAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved decoy and camouflage systems will greatly increase the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defenses. And our missile support modules now feature a number of predictive systems which should help missile range even more.

StringTable.Label: GenericIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Cluster warheads are capable of specifically targeting and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our missile support systems can now make use of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, which allow for more efficient guidance and improved range.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantity, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply problems. But that's finally been addressed, and we should see cost savings across all of our kinetic weapon programs.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Tight clusters of particles emitted at high velocity gets around some of the practical limitations of slug based mass drivers. These pulse cannons have similar tactical characteristics as previous kinetic weapons. They're just more powerful.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newest superconductors and the steeper energy delivery curves they enable should lead to higher muzzle velocities, at the trade off of smaller projectiles. These weapons should have a longer effective range with no reduction in damage potential.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconducting electromagnetic coils and their less-strenuous cooling requirements make them much less fragile to handle. We expect to see significant cost savings now that we won't break as many during production.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new ultra-low resistance electromagnets generate a lot more kick per unit weight, leading to lower mass accelerators. We can feel free to cram more of them into whatever we're cramming them in to.

StringTable.Label: GenericGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: By launching pulses of gravitons we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of enemy ships that they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage, and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy right before they die.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: "We Make Kinetic Weapons Faster," is probably the dumbest slogan ever conceived of, but the factory workers seem really proud of it, so no-one had the heart to tell them. And to be fair, they do make them really quite quickly and cheaply now.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have all but mastered kinetic weapons, having made them as mass efficient as theoretically possible, allowing even our smallest vessels to pack a hellacious punch.

StringTable.Label: GenericQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum drivers fire shells that contain small quantum fields which pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension on impact. We're not sure which dimension. We can only hope that they didn't need that mass.

StringTable.Label: GenericSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro singularities that collapse into existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: GenericMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now embed inertial modification tech inside projectiles, allowing them to generate ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period to improve their armor penetrating capabilities. And our kinetic augmentation systems have gotten a bit better.

StringTable.Label: GenericInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: GenericInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our projectiles are now capable of attacking armor directly, creating low density fissures that can cause the whole structure to splinter. Additionally our kinetic augmentation systems have increased their range boosting effects yet again.

StringTable.Label: GenericMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: GenericMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We already have a significant amount of structures in orbit and on the ground, all of which can be militarized with modest extra investment and some new uniforms.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: GenericPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. A little hard to imagine it, but we must accept that humans are now the alien invaders.

StringTable.Label: GenericInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Planetary Bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: GenericInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: So it turns out that thanks to the properties of mass, the easiest way to pacify something is to just drop something on it. It takes a bit of practice to get right, but the practice is fun itself.

StringTable.Label: GenericInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Informational Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: GenericInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare lacks a certain visceral appeal. But EMPs and targeted hacking attacks can cripple an enemy's coordination and limit the effectiveness of their defenses without needing to risk any of our own viscera.

StringTable.Label: GenericInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Biological Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: GenericInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Let's be honest. If we're now the alien invaders, there's no reason we have to pretend we're the good guys. Yes we'll have to live with the consequences of using biological weapons. But at least we'll be the ones who live.

StringTable.Label: GenericStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: GenericStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.

StringTable.Label: GenericGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: GenericGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By directing powerful gravitational fields at enemy ground defenses, we can induce flooding and even tectonic activity. The ground shall quake beneath our enemy's feet or feet-analogs.

StringTable.Label: GenericGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: GenericGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Inducing a planet to suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity is a pretty extreme step. That said, it certainly will pacify any hostiles. Also liquefy them.

StringTable.Label: GenericDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
